ast.util

Class SeqNum32

  • java.lang.Object
    • ast.util.SeqNum32

  • public class SeqNum32
extends java.lang.Object
    A more efficient implementation of modular arithmetic for 32 bits (range in [0 .. 2^32 -1]).
    See Also:
    SeqNum

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int add(int a, int b)
      Sumation modulo 2^32 (advance b times the sequence number a).
      static int diff(int a, int b)
      Difference modulo 2^32.
      static boolean leq(int a, int b)
      leq(a,b) equivals to a == b || lt(a,b).
      static boolean lt(int a, int b)
      Comparison modulo 2^32.
      static int pred(int a)
      Predecessor of given sequence number.
      static int succ(int a)
      Successor of given sequence number.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • leq

        public static boolean leq(int a,
                          int b)
        leq(a,b) equivals to a == b || lt(a,b).

      • lt

        public static boolean lt(int a,
                         int b)
        Comparison modulo 2^32. Returns a < b modulo 2^32.

      • succ

        public static int succ(int a)
        Successor of given sequence number.

      • pred

        public static int pred(int a)
        Predecessor of given sequence number.

      • add

        public static int add(int a,
                      int b)
        Sumation modulo 2^32 (advance b times the sequence number a).

      • diff

        public static int diff(int a,
                       int b)
        Difference modulo 2^32. Result r = diff(a,b) means equivalence add(b,r) == a.
